ygData.subject: Re: FireStrike's Rage
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron s one eye zoomed in then out, making a whirling noise. His shredded face gave away views of deep thought. It is our destiny. he whispered. Yes, you

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron's one eye zoomed in then out, making a whirling noise. His
shredded face gave away views of deep thought. "It is our destiny." he
whispered. "Yes, you sound very much like someone from Cybertron a long
time ago, he gave a quote very close to yours." Megatron notted, highly
amused by that fact.
